title: Is there a file limit for Unity Collaborate? If so, what is it?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am interested in using Unity Collaborate and would like to know if there is a maximum file amount to upload.

sections.title: Cause
content: You are a current user or are interested in using Unity Collaborate and would like to know if there is a file limit for uploading.

sections.title: Resolution
content: There is no total limit to the number of files. A maximum of 10,000 files can be uploaded at one time. If the project contains more files, simply press upload again and the remaining files will be uploaded.
